description.value:
Clock faces and gears adorn the twisted iron shaft of a chronomancer staff, the hands of the clocks continually ticking or winding backward. Used as a weapon, the staff is a +2 greater striking speed staff. While wielding this staff, you also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Time Sense]{Time Sense}
  • 1st@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Déjà Vu]{Déjà Vu}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Synchronize]{Synchronize}
  • 2nd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Loose Time's Arrow]{Loose Time's Arrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Synchronize]{Synchronize}
  • 3rd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Day's Weight]{Day's Weight}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Haste]{Haste}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Slow]{Slow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Time Jump]{Time Jump}
  • 4th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Curse Of Lost Time]{Curse Of Lost Time}
  • 5th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Quicken Time]{Quicken Time}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Rewinding Step]{Rewinding Step}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Stagnate Time]{Stagnate Time}
  • 6th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Cast into Time]{Cast into Time}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Day's Weight]{Day's Weight}
  • 7th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Time Beacon]{Time Beacon}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
